thread.title: Bikini.com Presents New Interactive Videos Highlighting an Insider's Guide to Palm Springs and a Yoga Tutorial
thread.title_full: Bikini.com Presents New Interactive Videos Highlighting an Insider's Guide to Palm Springs and a Yoga Tutorial

author: admin
title: Bikini.com Presents New Interactive Videos Highlighting an Insider's Guide to Palm Springs and a Yoga Tutorial
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/23/2015 @ 12:49 PM   Bikini.com 
NEW YORK, Oct. 23, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Bikini.com , the online luxury beach lifestyle destination, will be releasing two exciting new additions, "Palm Springs with Roxy" and "Flow a Long Yoga," to its video channel on Monday, October 26th. Both videos were produced in a special creative collaboration between Bikini.com and award-winning director, Ella Hatamian . 
Shot in a dreamy narrative style, "Palm Springs with Roxy" reveals three quintessential Palm Springs destinations. Star of reality TV show #RichKidsofBeverlyHills and interior designer, Roxy Sowlaty , leads the audience through Twin Palms Vacation Home , the Amado , and The Parker Palm Springs . Sowlaty interviews photographer and entrepreneur, Jaime Kowal , on her inspiration behind the recent renovation of the Amado. 
"Flow a Long Yoga," stars Alexa Parashos , founder of Yoga in House. The video, filmed against an inspirational rolling hills landscape, is a step-by-step tutorial on how to perform, deepen and modify foundational yoga poses. 
"Palm Springs with Roxy" and "Flow a Long Yoga" are extensions of the "Bikini Traveler" and "Bikini Body" video series. All original Bikini.com programming can be found on Bikini.com, YouTube, and Facebook. 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20150602/220413LOGO 
About Bikini.com Bikini.com is a new luxury beach lifestyle website featuring an online designer boutique and an editorial platform highlighting articles on fashion, beauty, health, travel and more. The site recently launched a video channel which can be found on Bikini.com, Youtube and Facebook. The online boutique highlights a curated collection of one-of-a-kind swimwear, accessories and beauty products from 30+ brands including Acacia, Beach Bunny, Issa de' Mar, Kovey, Marysia, Mikoh, Seafolly, Solkissed, Vita Liberata and Water Glamour. Bikini.com is a subsidiary of Remark Media, Inc. http://bikini.com 
About Ella Hatamian Ella Hatamian is an award-winning producer and director for film and video. Recent credits include Homemakers (a narrative film selected to participate in IFP's Lab Program in 2013); The Ordinary World ( recently acquired by Bunim-Murray); Sticky Notes (a feature film starring Ray Liotta, Rose Leslie and Gina Rodriguez) and creative advising for videos with Nowness and Life + Times (Jay Z's blog). Ella's work has won awards in festivals such as Locarno, IFFBoston, Clermont Ferrand, New Orleans and more. http://ellahat.com 
About Remark Media, Inc. Remark Media, Inc. (NASDAQ: MARK) is a global digital media company focused primarily on the 18-year-old to 34-year-old. The company owns and operates digital media properties, such as websites and applications for mobile devices, providing unique, dynamic digital media experiences in multiple content verticals including personal finance, young adult lifestyle, travel, education and entertainment. The company is headquartered in Las Vegas, Nevada, with additional operations in China. For more information, please visit www.remarkmedia.com .
